Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of the phenotypic characteristics of 297 functionally hemizygous patients , 105 of the mutations were assigned to one of four arbitrary phenotype categories .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Table:

| Disease |
| --- |
| functionally hemizygous patients |

Note: In this paragraph, there are no clear mentions of a specific disease. The phrase "functionally hemizygous patients" refers to patients who have only one functional copy of a particular gene, rather than a specific disease.
